==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''Wadi''|ar=وَادِي}} refers to a river valley, while ''Majuj'' is what the Sumerians call [[Hilichurls]]<ref>Interactable: [[Akademiya Investigation Team's Logs]]</ref>. Together, ''Wadi Al-Majuj'' roughly translates to "Canyon of the Hilichurls."
